chunks.text:
1. The iconic fountain in the opening credits is from Warner Bros Studio backlot.
2. Jennifer Aniston and Courteney Cox were roommates before filming.
3. Joey’s catchphrase 'How you doin’?' became a pop culture phenomenon.

Rachel Green: fashion-forward, grows from spoiled waitress to career woman.
Monica Geller: obsessive-compulsive chef, motherly friend.
Ross Geller: paleontologist, has on-and-off relationship with Rachel.
Chandler Bing: sarcastic, works in statistical analysis and data reconfiguration.
Joey Tribbiani: aspiring actor, loves food, loyal friend.
Phoebe Buffay: quirky musician with a mysterious past.
Friendship, love, personal growth, humor in everyday life.
The series follows six friends living in Manhattan, navigating careers, relationships, and life’s ups and downs, often centered around their hangout at Central Perk.
